sentence.Network_en: Push an Azalea branch which is near the ground into the soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 把一根靠近地面的杜鹃树枝压进土里.

sentence.Network_en: The Hibiscus, Azalea and Oleander are some common shrubs.
sentence.Network_cn: 大红花, 杜鹃和夹竹桃是一些常见的灌木.

sentence.Network_en: One lone azalea blooming brilliant red against the gray.
sentence.Network_cn: 一株孤独的杜鹃花在灰色天空的衬托下怒呈着它那艳丽的红.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek, feminine of azaleos 'dry', because the shrub flourishes in dry soil

entry.def: An azalea is a woody plant with shiny, dark-green leaves which produces many brightly-coloured flowers in the spring.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous ornamental shrubs grown for their showy flowers of various colors
